definitions.example: We hold her in high esteem.

definitions.definition: To set a high value on; to regard with respect or reverence.
To regard something as valuable; to prize.
To look upon something in a particular way.
definitions.example: Mary is an esteemed member of the community.

definitions.definition: To judge; to estimate; to appraise
definitions.example: The Earth, which I esteem unable to reflect the rays of the Sun.
